entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 33 in the morning then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 33 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
